text: Ani amhi kahi taktyanvara pratyeka prakaraca bodha-upadesa ani pratyeka gostica tapasila tyanna lihuna dila. Tumhi tyanna purna sakti-samarthyane dhara ani apalya lokanna takida kara ki tyatalya cangalya adesanusara acarana kara. Ata lavakaraca tumha lokanna tya duracari lokance sthana dakhavito
